content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I am glad you found the apartment to your liking. Let's indeed talk about the rental price. I am looking to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Please feel free to make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I'm a student, so I'm on a budget. How about if I rent the apartment for 400 Euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, Mr. Abbasi, but 400 Euros per month is far below my expectations. I am looking for a significantly higher amount. Please feel free to make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 500 Euros per month? It's a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Abbasi, but 500 Euros per month is still too low for my liking. I am looking for a higher amount. Please feel free to make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. How about 600 Euros per month? It's a good price for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While 600 Euros per month is a step closer to my expectations, I am still seeking a higher amount. Please feel free to make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think 600 Euros per month is a fair price for the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Mr. Abbasi. Thank you for your time. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
